reviews.review_msg: 332 is optional, but I recommend it before starting your grad project. Wish it was earlier in the curriculum.

332 with Simone was definitely more of a cinematography class than a pre production course, but we ended up learning a lot anyways. He respects and cares about individual projects and doesnt pick favourites. Simone is one of the few profs who wants you to succeed within your own style and voice.
